name: Yakuza Took My Pants - GUNderpants
description:
Defeat the Yakuza who took your pants,

Marco Flores - Dictator

JP - Environmental design, Level Design, 3D modeler.

Hue-n - Lead Programmer, Cutscene Tech.

Andrew Jankowski - Prop 3D Modeler.

Joshua Ambrocio - Sound Design/Music. Title Technical Designer. Pun Coordinator. Comic Relief. The Cream of Crop. The Apple of my eye. 

Colby Breitenbach or (Arkiteuthis) - Modeled Final Boss and created Boss theme.

Michael Fiorello - Character 3D modeling, texturing and animation.

TankTheta - Character 3d modeling.

W,A,S,D - movement controls

Mouse - look around

Left mouse button hold - shoot

Right mouse button hold - aim

* R key to reset scene,

and also, pause button does work. Oops.
